title: You can tell something's wrong with Kalista when
body:
Kassadin is actually a sympathy champion for her kit being so broken.

A large number of Kalista complaints include Kassadin, and they're comparing her mobility as being insanely stronger than his. It's crazy how she's so obnoxious that she's hated more than one of League's historically most difficult to balance champions.

Riot's really fucked up if they actually made mobility more hated than a low CD flash on an assassin.

**Just editing in to say that a champion being universally hated more than Kassadin is probably hotfix worthy.**

She has got to be the most unfun champ to play against. Playing against a kalista has got to be the most frustrating thing in league for me.

Problem is a good Kalista will show you just how broken of a champion she is.

She outclasses almost 70% of the adc pool.

She is a utility adc, with godlike amounts of damage, and godlike mobility, along with self, and 100 succesful allied peel.

She out expunges twitch, out initiates Varus and Ashe, and out "Hops" Lucian.

How is that not broken?

Kalista is a champion I would imagine would have come out around the time champions like Yorick and Lee Sin did.

She lacks counterplay, is very very very unfun to play against, has an overloaded kit, is a generalist who out preforms specialists... she is the Lee Sin of adc's.

And she came out only a few months ago.

What was riot thinking....

I would say she even defeats the whole "Just cc her argument". A good Kalista will very much just hop away after the cc ends, while lifestealing stupid high amounts of hp, while knocking you up with her oathsworne. And god forbid she has someone else on her team who can peel for her, or assists her in doing damage.

You cant kill her in teamfights unless she fucks up. You cant do anything. Nothing at all. Even if you do manage to finally catch her, she has teamates. Some of these teamates are also carries more than likely.

Like honestly, I could understand CertainlyT's other creations. I could see the innovation. Kalista was just made to piss people off.

A spear throwing, undead warrior from the shadow isles. Okay, thats great, love it. Her Passive would actually be fine, if she wasnt also a tankbuster, if she didnt have 2 cc's one of which is a knock up, if she didnt have a get out of jail free card for her support, if she didnt have free wards that can traverse the entire river, if she didnt have an ability that is literally a better version out twitch's expunge, that allows her to outsmight a nunu or a cho'gath. 

Like, it really looks like I am just complaining, but can you really deny how much of a monstrosity this champion is?

She needs a rework, or deletion, and she JUST CAME OUT.
